mapper.update: UPDATE Question set title=#{title}, writer = #{writer}, modifyDate=sysdate, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id,title,writer,FORMATDATETIME(writedate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') as writeDate,FORMATDATETIME(modifydate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:MM') as modifyDate,content,count FROM question LIMIT #{count} OFFSET (#{page}-1) * #{count}
